page.title: 15Ebbw Vale Fire Station
page.content: {EBBW VALE FIRE STATION} This fire station operates 7 days a week from 08.00 to 18.00. The remaining hours are covered by a bleeper system so that the firemen have to live within 'running' distance of the station. It employs 18 men(nine men each shift). They have 2 Fire engines, 1 Fire attender(rescue vehicle), 1 Landrover and 1 Van. The firemen have 2 hours drill every day. There is a 4 storeyed tower used for training,they use the top floor for drying the hoses. {BRYNMAWR FIRE STATION } This station is run on a part-time basis.
